full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): #, ,RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI RNAL 'BYOR ROL BA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @012A *, ,(CES RTA MGRIN GSANG SGRUB KYI TSOGS 'KHOR GYI CHO GA RNAL 'BYOR ROL BA'I DGA' STON ZHES BYA BA 'DI YANG, ZHVA DMAR SNGAGS PA GU RU BKRA SHIS KYIS BSKUL BA DANG, LHA 'DI NYID YI DAM DU BYED PA MANG PO LA'ANG PHAN PAR MTHONG NAS RGYAL KHAMS NYUL BA'I DHARMA BADZRA GYIS TSOGS 'KHOR SPYI DANG SGO BSTUN CING YIG RNYING GI DGONGS PA DANG YANG MA 'GAL BAR SNA TSOGS DBYIG CES PA SHING MO SPRUL GYI LO MI'I DBANG PO WAR RATNA SIDDHI PHO BRANG DU SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DGE SLONG BLO BZANG DAGS BGYI SO, ,)
